newsitem.title: UK: Hambro Country downplays UK rate rise impact.
newsitem.headline: Hambro Country downplays UK rate rise impact.

text.p: British estate agency and financial products group Hambro Countrywide Plc said on Thursday it believed Britain's economic recovery would comfortably endure changes in interest rates.

"It is our belief that the recovery is now sufficiently well established to endure comfortably any further modest changes in interest rates," chairman Christopher Sporborg said in a statement from the firm's annual meeting.
His comments came after Britain's new Labour government on Tuesday raised base rates by a quarter-point to 6.25 percent.
